options: To unwind the DNA double helix
To identify the specific target DNA sequence
To cut the target DNA sequence
To repair the cut DNA sequence
To translate the edited gene into protein
To act as a primer for DNA replication
correct_answer: To identify the specific target DNA sequence

text: Which thermodynamic potential is minimized for a system at constant temperature and pressure when it reaches equilibrium?

Which of the following is a key characteristic of a Bose-Einstein condensate?
options: All particles occupy the lowest quantum state
It only occurs at extremely high temperatures
It is composed entirely of fermions
It violates the Pauli exclusion principle
It is a high-energy plasma state
It is the state of matter inside neutron stars
correct_answer: All particles occupy the lowest quantum state

text: In astrophysics, what is the Chandrasekhar limit?
options: The maximum mass of a stable white dwarf star
The distance to the nearest star system
The minimum mass for nuclear fusion to ignite
The event horizon radius of a black hole
The maximum luminosity of a main sequence star
The density threshold for star formation
correct_answer: The maximum mass of a stable white dwarf star

text: What is the primary function of the enzyme telomerase?
options: Adding telomeric repeats to chromosome ends
correct_answer: Adding telomeric repeats to chromosome ends

The 'Mfecane' was a period of widespread chaos and warfare among indigenous ethnic communities in southern Africa during the early 19th century. It is primarily associated with the expansion of which nation?

The 'Sack of Constantinople' in 1204 during the Fourth Crusade resulted in the partition of the Byzantine Empire and the establishment of a short-lived 'Latin Empire'. Who was the first Latin Emperor?
The 'Doctrine of Lapse' was an annexation policy purportedly devised by which British colonial administrator in India?

The 'Battle of Ain Jalut' (1260) is celebrated in history as the first major defeat of the Mongol army. Which Mamluk Sultanate general, who was originally a Kipchak Turkic slave, led the victorious forces?
